goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 2066kB)
source_organisation_1: National Institute of Statistics of Rwanda (NISR)
title: Proportion of urban solid waste regularly collected and with adequate final discharge out of total urban solid waste generated, by cities
national_indicator_available:
Distribution (%) of households by main mode of waste management, according to urban/rural, province and sex of head of household.

Main mode of rubbish disposal (waste management); Rubbish collection service
computation_definitions: Proportion solid waste regularly collected from households out of total solid waste generated.
computation_calculations: (Solid waste regularly collected / Total solid waste generated) * 100
